title: Drawing, "Altar", ca. 1770
medium:
Pen and brown ink, watercolor, black chalk, grahite
Support: off-white laid paper
inscribed: Signed in pen and brown ink at lower right: A. Foschini; at lower margin [a scale] Piedi Ferraresi
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
